segments.text: You always stick to your PC recently . Are you still fascinated by chatting on line ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For me , the times of chatting online has gone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What the hell are you doing now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I opened my blog today . In order to have more visitors , I have to land on others ' blogs and leave my messages for their blogs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , he was our monitor in college . How is him now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He seemed to be dumped by his girlfriend . I found his blogs were a little sad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . What a moving poem !
segments.speaker: S1
